snippet: Attorney General Eric Holder on Wednesday urged first responders to use an overdose-reversal drug to help save lives amid a nationwide resurgence in heroin abuse, a public health scourge claiming the lives of celebrities and young people alike....

headline.print_headline: Holder Urges Use of Overdose-Reversal Drug
headline.main: Holder Urges Use of Overdose-Reversal Drug

lead_paragraph: Attorney General Eric Holder on Wednesday urged first responders to use an overdose-reversal drug to help save lives amid a nationwide resurgence in heroin abuse, a public health scourge claiming the lives of celebrities and young people alike.
